posts.post_title: BUYING > T205 Cobb, Mathewson & Young PSA 2.5, PSA 3 or PSA 3.5
posts.post_content:
I want to buy a high end for grade T205 Cobb, Mathewson & Young.

The posted T205 Johnson illustrates the desired condition attributes.

Please send a private message with images and pricing, thank you!
That is the one Memory Lane just sold - did you get it?

[quote name="jsfriedm" post=2405961]That is the one Memory Lane just sold - did you get it?[/QUOTE]

Yessir :)

I would consider this one but it's probably a bit more than you are looking for. This one won't be the price of a regular 4.5 or 5 or most 6s....I paid up for it but if the price were right.

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/t2052.jpg[/IMG]

Congrats, especially since I even thought it would go a bit higher.
